channel.title: markus on Dr. Markus Gardill
channel.description: Recent content in markus on Dr. Markus Gardill

item.description: Markus Gardill is head of the group for radar signal processing and tracking at InnoSenT GmbH, Donnersdorf, Germany. He also acts as lecturer at the Friedrich-Alexander-University Erlangen-NÃ¼rnberg for the field of wireless automotive electronics. He is vice-chair of the IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Societey Technical Committe 9 for digital signal processing. Since 2018, Markus Gardill serves as IEEE Distinguished Microwave Lecturer with a talk on automotive radar sytems.
